meanings.definition: A mass of fungal spores produced in a compact layer.
meanings.sent1: The acervuli on the leaf showed the presence of fungal spores.
meanings.sent2: The gardener noticed the acervuli forming on the plant.
meanings.sent3: The acervuli decided to have a party and invited all the fungal spores.
meanings.sent4: The acervuli resembled a tiny cityscape of fungal spores.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the acervuli looked like a bustling fungal metropolis.

meanings.definition: A small, dense cluster of fungal fruiting bodies.
meanings.sent1: The acervuli contained many tiny fungal fruiting bodies.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the acervuli to identify the fungal fruiting bodies.
meanings.sent3: The acervuli huddled together like a group of fungi having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The acervuli clung to the branch like a cluster of tiny mushrooms.
meanings.sent5: The acervuli stood out in the forest, a gathering of fungal fruiting bodies.
